subject: RE: [junit] New To J Unit
msgSnippet: JUnit can be used to test the type of application you have. A good place to start would be to read the documentation on http://www.junit.org Craig ... From:
messageBody:
JUnit can be used to test the type of application you have. A good place to start would be to read the documentation on http://www.junit.org

Craig

-----Original Message-----
From: Preeti [mailto:preeti@...]
Sent: Friday, October 03, 2003 2:58 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] New To J Unit


Hello,

I have never used JUnit before. I want to start creating test suite.
But I donot know where to get started.
The application to be tested is created using JSP's, Servelets,
Struts and Java files. It is based on MVC model. The application is
deployed on Tomcat and is IE based.

First this I want to know is Can I use JUnit to test this
application.

What kind of applications can be tested through JUnit ?

Thanks,
Preeti
